overview: As the founder of Worktopia, John Arenas leads the company as a proven executive and successful entrepreneur, with more than 25 years of experience developing and managing enterprises serving the corporate demand for meeting space and instant office space. Prior to starting Worktopia, John founded Stratis Business Centers, where he acted as CEO. Upon successful growth, Stratis was acquired by Regus, plc (RGU: London Stock Exchange), where John went on to act as President and General Manager of the Americas. He holds a B.S. degree in civil engineering from Rutgers University and a Masters degree in business administration from the University of Michigan.
